Public transport is available in the centre of the village of Cap Skirring, which is 1 km away. Description:
HotelDescription#This family-friendly hotel is located in the south of Cap Skirring, approximately 10 minutes from Cap Skirring village and 75 km from the town of Ziguinchor. The hotel is located on the beach in a beautiful tropical garden. The hotel is approximately 10 minutes from the airport.

This all-inclusive hotel, renovated in 2007, features 92 beach bungalows in a quiet tropical garden in front of the beach. The hotel's architecture is African style and the facilities include 2 restaurants, 2 bars, currency exchange facilities, souvenir shop, and games room. The hotel features a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out service, hotel safe, cloakroom, hairdressing salon, conference facilities and a car park. For an additional fee, guests can take advantage of the room and laundry services and bicycle hire.

The beach bungalows are equipped with double beds, a separate toilet and a bathroom with shower and bath, closet and table with chair. They also include a hairdryer, satellite/cable TV, minibar, individually regulated air conditioning, a safe and a balcony or terrace.

There is an outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers and parasols and a poolside snack bar. Tennis, VTT, pétanque, beach volleyball, table tennis, canoeing, surfing, mini-golf, surfcasting and the giant's chest game are just a few of the activities that this hotel offers. There is a hotel gym, and basketball, handball and volleyball are also offered. For an additional fee, guests can receive massage treatments and go jet skiing and windsurfing.

Guests can serve themselves at the breakfast, lunch and dinner buffets. Drinks are also included.

From the airport, take the road towards Kabrousse and the hotel is on your right at about 10 km.

Description:
The hotel is uniquely located on a sparkling, white sandy beach along the Saloum Delta. It is nestled amidst a heavenly island, 160 km away from Dakar. It is a 20-minute boat transfer to Dionewar Island, while Dakar airport is approximately 160 km away.

The charming hotel has a strong focus on environmental awareness, which has been the inspiration for the hotel. It comprises a total of 55 rooms. Guests are welcomed in the lobby, which offers a 24-hour check-out service, as well as a hotel safe and currency exchange facilities. Guests can relax in the TV lounge and enjoy a drink at the bar before dancing the night away at the disco. Further amenities include conference facilities and a laundry service, which is available for an additional fee.

The standard rooms are fitted with a bathroom featuring a shower and a toilet. Guests can also look forward to a good night's rest on their double bed. Rooms come further equipped with a safe, air conditioning and a children's bed. There is additionally a furnished terrace provided as standard in all accommodation units.

The hotel has 2 swimming pools, one of which features a bath with bubbles and the other offers sea views. Guests can enjoy a bite to eat at the poolside snack bar before relaxing on the sun loungers and under the parasols. Fitness enthusiasts can pay a visit to the on-site gym for a good workout. Guests can unwind in the hot tub or pamper themselves with a range of massage treatments (fees apply). Water sports fans can take the chance to go windsurfing, pedal boating or catamaran boating (fees apply). Back on dry land guests may enjoy the table tennis, beach volleyball and bocce facilities. There is additionally a small sports room, a boating centre and a beauty centre. The nearby sandy beach has parasols, which guests can use.

The hotel serves a breakfast buffet, while the lunchtime and evening meals can be enjoyed as a set menu.
